name: Yuki's Adventure
description:
Yuki's Adventure

Where the sea is home and land is a mystery, a young amphibian called Yuki sets out to travel the open seas. Read along with them and help them make the tough decisions, which depending on what choices you make can lead them down any number of strange paths.

Currently this is just a demo/test, the game has a long way to go before it can fully be announced as a complete game. But please feel free to play the intro and expect more updates in the future.

All comments and advice are appreciated and any questions and discussions of project are always available on my Tumblr
